Magic Notes:
Spell Focus (Evocation): +1 Spell DC (Evocation)
Wisdom Cleric Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1
Advanced Illusionist: +1 caster level on Illusion spells
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Brew Potion: May create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Compelling Magic: +2 DC on compulsion spells
Creator: +1 caster level on Creation spells
Extend Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell duration
Familial Protection: R10' 2 targets gain +4 AC for 5 rd 1/dy
Inspire Allies: Allies gain +2 attack, damage, save, skill, and ability rolls for 2 rd 1/dy
Mental Ward: Touch gives target +7 on next Will save for 1 hr 1/dy
Persistent Spell: May use +4 spell slot to extend duration of a personal or ranged spell to 1 dy
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: May cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Trade Secrets: May cast Detect Thoughts on 1 target for 2 min 1/dy (Will neg)
Water Breathing: May breathe water 50 rd/dy
